body_html:
@asimshankar I tried the second way you provided as following.
bazel build -c opt \ --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool \ --cpu=armeabi-v7a \ --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain \ tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so

But there are many errors such as
external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:655:7: note: C++11 'constexpr' only available with -std=c++11 or -std=gnu++11 external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:668:14: error: expected ';' at end of member declaration atomic() noexcept = default; ^ external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:668:16: error: 'noexcept' does not name a type atomic() noexcept = default; ^ external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:669:15: error: expected ';' at end of member declaration ~atomic() noexcept = default; ^ external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:669:17: error: 'noexcept' does not name a type ~atomic() noexcept = default; ^ external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:674:7: error: 'constexpr' does not name a type constexpr atomic(__integral_type __i) noexcept : __base_type(__i) { }

I think there's something wrong about the compilers. How do you think?
body:
@asimshankar I tried the second way you provided as following.
`bazel build -c opt \
  --crosstool_top=//external:android/crosstool \
  --cpu=armeabi-v7a \
  --host_crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:toolchain \
  tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so`

But there are many errors such as 
`external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:655:7: note: C++11 'constexpr' only available with -std=c++11 or -std=gnu++11
external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:668:14: error: expected ';' at end of member declaration
       atomic() noexcept = default;
              ^
external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:668:16: error: 'noexcept' does not name a type
       atomic() noexcept = default;
                ^
external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:669:15: error: expected ';' at end of member declaration
       ~atomic() noexcept = default;
               ^
external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:669:17: error: 'noexcept' does not name a type
       ~atomic() noexcept = default;
                 ^
external/androidndk/ndk/sources/cxx-stl/gnu-libstdc++/4.9/include/atomic:674:7: error: 'constexpr' does not name a type
       constexpr atomic(__integral_type __i) noexcept : __base_type(__i) { }`

I think there's something wrong about the compilers. How do you think?
